title: If the Deep Sea Forgets You - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cohabitation   Cold Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Gangs   Handsome Male Lead   Lawyers   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Older Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Tragic Past
author: Su Fuling   苏茯苓
description:
When Xia Qingyi wakes up and finds herself in a hospital without any memories of her past, what else can she do other than to approach the person who had saved her?

Enter Mo Han, a renowned barrister in the legal world famous for his coldness, arrogance, and competence. With no one else to take care of Xia Qingyi, Mo Han finds himself with no other choice but to act as her elder brother for the time being.

However, it does not take long for him to realize that there was something wrong with the girl.

What’s up with her ability to read others at a drop of a hat?

How is she so adept in fighting?

Just… who in the world is this girl?

With his world being turned upside down with the appearance of this mysterious girl whose new world has nothing else but him, Mo Han’s search for her lost memories begins…>
